attributes.action: Make Wi-fi Free Worldwide and Get it anywhere in the world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need people to Have worldwide Internet Services (Called WIS). The internet should be Free to everyone and you should be able to receive It anywhere in the world. Have you ever wanted to send a Email or Check a website and you cannot Get online, So, we Need signatures to make wi-fi internet Free everywhere and anywhere. The computer acess terminal is Important

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
